parties: Vasantha PremakumaraKudaliyanage and other vs. Renuka Nandani Kurukulasuriya and three others
keywords: Landlord and Tenant - Application to the Housing Commissioner under Section 18A of the Rent Act to demolish a rented premises –To be allowed ‘if the Commissioner is satisfied’ – Criteria to be adopted by the Housing Commissioner - Objective test and subjective test - Writ of certiorari sought in the High Court against the decision of the Housing Commissioner
legistation: Section 18A of the  Rent Act No. 7 of 1972, as amended.
